function.name: README
function.description:
## DocumentWriter

This workflow helps you write a document by writing outlines first, then filling in the content for each outline.

![image](https://www.anthropic.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F7418719e3dab222dccb379b8879e1dc08ad34c78-2401x1000.png&w=3840&q=75)

function.name: Input
function.description: Please provide the title and brief description of the document you want to write

function.name: WriteOutline
function.description: Write the outline of the document

function.name: CheckOutline
function.description: Check if the outline is to the point and well structured for the given title and brief description

function.name: OutlineCheckFail
function.description: Invoke if the outline fails the check

function.name: FillContent
function.description: Fill in the content for each outline

function.name: CheckContent
function.description: Check if the content follows the outline and is well written

function.name: ContentCheckFail
function.description: Invoke if the content fails the check
